p: Sequence similarity and nucleotide base composition analysis were performed using the CLUSTALX software [ 26], BioEdit software [ 27] MEGA-X [ 28] and MegAlign (DNASTAR, Madison, WI, USA). Hemi (version1.0) [ 29] software visualized the similarity comparison results of LNV and Rstudio made the nucleotide base composition analysis map of LNV.
